location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter concerns an English boy who is being held captive by Sayd Mahomed Akilli [Sayyid Muhammad Aqil]. William Bruce states that he has been informed of the arrival of Sayd Mahomed Akilli's ship at Muscat (without its owner on board), and makes the suggestion that the ship be seized upon its arrival at Bushire.
